attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Bound Value
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: id
attrs.desc: This parameter is valid only for type=message. If you do not want to click a window repeatedly, you can set a unique ID to prevent repeated prompts.

attrs.name: is-form-reset
attrs.desc: Close the pop-up window. The form data is reset by default.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: title
attrs.desc: Window title (internationalization is supported)

attrs.name: type
attrs.desc: Window type; The options of this attribute are alert, confirm, and message.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is alert.

attrs.name: status
attrs.desc: This parameter is valid only for type=alert | confirm | message. The options of this attribute are info, success, warning, error, loading
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is info.

attrs.name: message
attrs.desc: Content of the modal, Type: plain text/VNode, or function that returns String/VNode

attrs.name: show-header
attrs.desc: Display Header
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: showFooter
attrs.desc: Display bottom

attrs.name: lock-view
attrs.desc: Whether to lock the page. Operations outside the window are not allowed.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: lock-scroll
attrs.desc: Whether to lock the scroll bar to disable page scrolling.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: mask
attrs.desc: Display mask layer
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: mask-closable
attrs.desc: Whether to allow clicking the mask layer to close the window

attrs.name: esc-closable
attrs.desc: Whether to allow closing the window by pressing Esc
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: resize
attrs.desc: Whether to allow dragging to adjust the window size
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: duration
attrs.desc: This parameter is valid only when type is set to message. It indicates the delay for automatic disabling.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 3000.

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Window width

attrs.name: height
attrs.desc: Window height

attrs.name: min-width
attrs.desc: Minimum width of the window

attrs.name: min-height
attrs.desc: Minimum height of the window

attrs.name: top
attrs.desc: This parameter is valid only when type is set to message. It indicates the position from the top of the message.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 15

attrs.name: zIndex
attrs.desc: User-defined stacking sequence (It may be used in some special scenarios, for example, when it is blocked.)
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 3000.

attrs.name: fullscreen
attrs.desc: Maximized display by default
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

slots.name: footer
slots.desc: Template at the bottom of the window

events.name: show
events.desc: This event is triggered when the window is displayed. params: {type //Event type, $modal //Component instance}

events.name: hide
events.desc: This event is triggered when the window is closed. params: {type //Event type, $modal //Component instance}

events.name: confirm
events.desc: This event is triggered when the OK button is clicked. params: {type //Event type, $modal //Component instance}, event: native event

events.name: close
events.desc: This event is triggered when the close button is clicked. params: {type //Event type, $modal //Component instance}, event: native event

events.name: cancel
events.desc: This event is triggered when the Cancel button is clicked. params: {type //Event type, $modal //Component instance}, event: native event

events.name: zoom
events.desc: This event is triggered when a window is zoomed in or out. params: {type //Event type, $modal //Component instance}, event: native event
